abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach as many basic [W] Energy cards from your hand to any of your Pok√©mon in any way you like. If you do, your turn ends. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each [W] Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.
